body: i was not expecting a happy ending but it is a welcome one
My god the MC is a literal Marth ripoff. Plus they even named him Ares, as in the Greek equivalent of Mars, aka Marth's Japanese name (Marth is a mistranslation)

It's not that confusing
The succubus wants the hero's sperm in her pussy, but he doesn't want to fuck her (Why? No idea... I would if I had a D)
She capture the princess, Use swap body magic:
Succubus>Hero;
Hero>Princess;
Princess>Succubus.
The princess in heat in the succubus's body start to play with the hero in her body.The hero passes out. The succubus in the hero's body impregnate herself and fuck the hero.
The hero cancel the spell and flee with the princess. Then The Hero copy the spell and continue to have sex with the princess in the other's body.
It's that simple./s
I think I broke my brain trying to figure out the plot. If anyone could post a short version here would be great
Confusing but not awful. Vanillaey enough and full color going in the favs
